attributes.action: Introduce cap on the fuel companies to stop their daily increase of fuel prices
attributes.additional_details: For many the use of cars/vans is essential to get to work and for general use, with the daily increase of fuel prices many are struggling to afford the new price every time it increases with many having to choose between a small food shop and filling up their car so they can travel to work, with the tax also included in the price these companies are able to increase their prices they are recording record breaking profits and and the average uk home is struggling therefore change is needed
attributes.background: The daily increase in fuel prices is a serious issue that many struggle to pay and compete with financially

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282

Cap profit fuel forecourt operators can make on petrol and diesel to 10p/litre: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616956
